Posts.Content: Jun 4, 2012 01:25AM cmomof4 wrote: Hi everyone.  As a crushed ice addict, I can tell you, Sonic's ice is fantastic!  Also,  most Pilot stores (truck-stops) or Flying J stores have the same machine as Sonic, as do MotoMart stores.  The "Scotsmas Nugget" ice machine.  I am almost always registered to win one!  I've always said if I ever win the lotto, a Scotsman is the first thing I'm going to buy for my kitchen!  There is an ap for nugget ice, and a facebook page too!  For crushing ice, I've found that a meat tenderizer works great! Cynthia
